requiredEquipmentExplanation:
Based on the video metadata, it is clear that this workout requires no equipment. The title and tags consistently highlight that this is an at-home, no-equipment workout designed to target the abs and core. The description explicitly states "This is a 10 minute COMPLETE core workout that requires NO EQUIPMENT and can be done from home!" This strongly indicates that the exercises are designed to be executed without any external tools.

Although the description mentions the mat used by the instructor, it is described in a promotional context rather than as a necessity for the workout. Additionally, there is no mention in the comments or tags suggesting the use of any specific equipment. Therefore, the workout appears to be bodyweight only, with a very high confidence of no equipment being required.
